LanguageData.ARimWorldOfMagic_2_5_1.content:
Update 2.5.1
New Class: Brightmage - combines energy from light and mana to great effect. Abilities: o Light Lance - focused beam of light that burns everything in its path o Sunfire - burning slashes of light cut across the target area o Burst of Light - blinds and disorients targets in an area o Light Skip - ride waves of light for near-instant movement o Refraction - creates a wall of light that modifies the properties of projectiles as they pass through o Spirit of Light - summons a friendly spirit that protects and assists the caster
--See mod discord announcements for all the update details! - https://discord.gg/ksksHj --
